com.foreach.across.core.transformers

Interface ExposedBeanDefinitionTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanRenameTransformer, BeanDefinitionTransformerComposite, BeanPrefixingTransformer, BeanRenameTransformer, PrimaryBeanTransformer

    public interface ExposedBeanDefinitionTransformer
    Apply modification to a set of BeanDefinitions and singletons. During the Across bootstrap the transformer is called before the exposed beans are copied to the parent. Can be used to rename beans, modify the BeanDefinition, add beans etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ExposedBeanDefinitionTransformer REMOVE_ALL
      Simple transformer that removes all ExposedBeanDefinitions, ensuring that no beans will be exposed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transformBeanDefinitions(Map<String,ExposedBeanDefinition> beanDefinitions)
      Modify the collection of ExposedBeanDefinitions.

    • Field Detail

      • REMOVE_ALL

        static final ExposedBeanDefinitionTransformer REMOVE_ALL
        Simple transformer that removes all ExposedBeanDefinitions, ensuring that no beans will be exposed. Use this instance on the AcrossContext to disable exposing to the parent ApplicationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • transformBeanDefinitions

        void transformBeanDefinitions(Map<String,ExposedBeanDefinition> beanDefinitions)
        Modify the collection of ExposedBeanDefinitions.
        Parameters:
        beanDefinitions - Map of exposed bean definitions.
